|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 166 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL064M90TFIR4; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Mira;P2V64S40ETP-G6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996L; |voip_ports = 2 |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:13:10, 00:16:B6, 00:18:39 |oui = 00:18:39, 00:13:10 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 5-pin header |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = Dual channel telephone line interface;Legerity;Le88221;Le88221DLC V A G 0518HAB;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.15.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys |defaultssid_regex = ^linksys$ |default_ch = |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/11/2005 |estreldate = 05/13/2005 |estprice = |upc = 745883564903 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0009P657S |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = CyberTAN WM610-T |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1130; |rad1chip2 = Texas Instruments;RC2422B; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== WRTP54G serial numbers would seem to start with '''CJJ0'''. A unit with a S/N of '''CJJ0'''1F716421 has the following... *a '''[[Texas Instruments]]''' TNETV1060ZDW (TNETV1060) processor *a '''[[Spansion]]''' 8MB Flash (S29GL064M90TFIR4) and 16MB RAM (2x '''[[MIRA]]''' P2V64S40ETP-G6) *silkscreened text of "3763-14140201R" on the main board *'''HERMEI''' capacitors *a 00:18:39 OUI on the external MAC label and internal Mini PCI wireless module label *Country of Origin noted as China *All blue LEDs This router is used with Vonage. The default SSID is '''linksys'''. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=275119 On the DD-WRT forums]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/rtp300_and_wrtp54g On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.marceloeiras.com.br/dicas/wrtp54g/wrtp54g_hack.html Alternative Firmware and Hacking the Linksys WRTP54G-NA (in Spanish)] :"3762-14141506" is silkscreened on the board. [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRTP54G_router On Wikipedia] [[Category:English Documentation]]
